title: Can't play video error
content:
Tried safe mode 
My videos doesn't play anywhere .when I shot through pixel it did get recorded and I can see the storage occupying some space and is in .mp4 format. When I try to play it give a clean white screen and written can't play video. It doesn't get attached to any email or any wats app or any other platform to transfer and check.while recording  and at the end of the recording that particular moment, I did receive out of storage message. However I did stop and checked the video. It played well.aftersometime. It didn't.this is the third video happening like this. Please resolve or if anyone has any answer
